name: Warplane inc.
description: Warplane inc is a 2D flight simulator in which the player will get acquainted with the history of a hypothetical war, the stories of its heroes and victims, as well as the development of military aviation. Learn to fly, win your missions and earn money to upgrade your plane and weapons. Finally buy a nuclear bomb and ... can you press the button? If you start it, you have no chance to stopping it.
